title: Mom
writer: Girish Kohli, Ravi Udyawar, Kona Venkat
short_cast: Sridevi, Akshaye Khanna, Sajal Ali, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Adnan Siddiqui, Pitobash, Abhimanyu Singh, Vikas Verma
cast: Sridevi, Akshaye Khanna, Sajal Ali, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Adnan Siddiqui, Pitobash, Abhimanyu Singh, Vikas Verma

desc: After her stepdaughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.
